name: lint-advpl-tlpp
description: Lint offline para ADVPL/TLPP — painel lateral com sugestões de escopo, nomenclatura e boas práticas.

commands.title: LINT ADVPL: Exportar relatório TXT (arquivo atual)

lint-advpl.showInProblems.description: Show lint issues in the Problems panel.

lint-advpl.editorUnderline.description: When true, show underlines/squiggles in the editor for issues; when false, publish issues to Problems without underlining code.

lint-advpl.ignoredNames.description: List of variable names (case-insensitive) to ignore for the unused-local rule. Use simple identifiers, without quotes.

lint-advpl.hungarianSuggestInitializers.description: When true, suggest initializer templates for variables based on Hungarian-style prefixes (e.g. 'a' -> ':= {}').

lint-advpl.hungarianIgnoreAsType.description: When true, do not suggest initializers for declarations that already include `As <Type>` (they are type-initialized).

lint-advpl.requireDocHeaderRequireName.description: When true, require the doc header to include the function/method name after `{Protheus.doc}` (e.g. `{Protheus.doc} myFunction`).

lint-advpl.requireDocHeaderIgnoreWsMetho.description: When true, ignore `WSMETHOD` declarations that are inside `WSRESTFUL ... END WSRESTFUL` blocks for doc-header checks.

lint-advpl.enableRules.description: Master switch to enable/disable all lint rules provided by this extension.

lint-advpl.rules.description: Per-rule enable/disable map. Set a rule to false to silence it.
